content: साहस्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (स्री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सहस्र-अण्] {@--1@} Relating to a thousand. {@--2@} Consisting of a thousand. {@--3@} Bought with a thousand. {@--4@} Paid per thousand (as interest &c.). {@--5@} A thousand-fold. --स्रः An army or detachment consisting of a thousand men. --स्रं An aggregate of a thousand.
